content: hi i would like to understand is there any feature in Zulip to integrate chat bots in a specific stream.

Hi @Lokesh Kansal I may not completely understand your question here, but our chat bot system is flexible in terms of which stream bots talk on. Most chat bots reply on the same stream where somebody mentions the bot, but the "followup" bot is an example of a bot that always write to the same stream.
BTW I renamed this topic to "chat bots". Also, we usually discuss chat bots on our #integrations stream. Feel free to continue here or more the conversation there if you have any questions.
